answers.answer: I am not a physician, but the mom of a type one and the daughter of a type 2 diabetic.One of the reasons your numbers are high after eating is that your are having carbohydrates and starches, which turn into sugars and raise your levels.  You should be testing your blood prior to eating not after eating.I would suggest you ask your doctor to test you for diabetes especially if you have the following symptoms.Warning signs of type 1 diabetes (these may occur suddenly):Extreme thirstFrequent urinationSudden vision changesSugar in urineFruity, sweet, or wine-like odor on breathIncreased appetiteSudden weight lossDrowsiness, lethargyHeavy, labored breathingStupor, unconsciousnessI hope this helps.   Good luck

Thank you so much.My fasting is always around 70.I never have symtoms as you have mentioned.Will it be wise to avoid sugar and starchy foods? I think by that I will be able to control sugar levels.Will it be wise to avoid any medication at this stage?Because prsent sugar levels can be kept normal by diet control.Please advise.

question: Friends,I take Veg diet.Means no eggs,fish,meat etc.If I 2-4 time take tea with sugar and then I take my veg meal with two ripe bananas my PP sugar level becomes 167.If I take more starchy foods at lunch then my PP level of sugar becomes 200.Is it Diabetece?Here I would like to mention that in morning my fasting blood sugar is always around 70.I drink plenty of water.I have no BP or Heart proble.Ashwinbapa
title: Is it Diabetece?
